column4: Hey Guys, i am searching a tool with that i can shrink a large images with 32x32 tiles. in the image are over 500 tiles but between the tiles free black space. now i wil shrink all black space to get a smale image =/
i dont will only remove the black space, i will shrink the content of the image
hmmm.. not getting your question, but gimp/script-fu might do the trick
